element.short: URI to identify the code system (e.g. in Coding.system)
element.definition: An absolute URI that is used to reference this code system, including in [Coding]{datatypes.html#Coding}.system.
element.comments: The reference is not required to point to any specific kind of definition, but the more information that can be provided, the more useful it is for implementers. Best practice is to resolve to a computable definition of the code system (either a value set, or some other format). Terminology servers MAY validate this reference (e.g. when accepting PUT/POST), and MAY make additional rules about what kind of content it refers to.
